products.shortDescription: Alkaline chemistry; cadmium and mercury free
products.shortDescriptionHtml: Alkaline chemistry; cadmium and mercury free
products.longDescription: Power up plenty of remote controls or toys with this pack of 60 AA batteries. These alkaline batteries have a long shelf life, letting you stock up now without worrying about low performance later. Keep this pack of 60 AA batteries in the drawer or closet to keep favorite gadgets running or ensure flashlights are ready during emergencies.
products.longDescriptionHtml: Power up plenty of remote controls or toys with this pack of 60 AA batteries. These alkaline batteries have a long shelf life, letting you stock up now without worrying about low performance later. Keep this pack of 60 AA batteries in the drawer or closet to keep favorite gadgets running or ensure flashlights are ready during emergencies.

features.feature:
Alkaline AA batteries
Supply reliable power to a wide variety of household electronics.

Environmentally friendly
Cadmium and mercury free.

60-pack
Provides a steady supply for your household electronics.
